goal: Implement Monk class levels 1-3: Martial Arts (DEX for unarmed/monk weapons, scaling damage), Ki points with recovery, Flurry of Blows, Patient Defense, Step of the Wind, Unarmored Movement, and Deflect Missiles

already_implemented: RecoverableResource with automatic recovery on short/long rest
ACChain for AC calculation modifiers (used by Unarmored Defense)
UnarmoredDefenseCondition for Barbarian (can reference for Monk version)
infrastructure_gaps: No MartialArts condition for DEX usage and damage scaling
No Ki resource type (need new RecoverableResource instance pattern)
No bonus action unarmed strike mechanism
No speed modifier system for Unarmored Movement
No reaction damage reduction for Deflect Missiles
patterns_to_follow: Use RecoverableResource for Ki points (see SecondWind, ActionSurge)
Use ACChain for Unarmored Defense (see Barbarian implementation)
Use AttackChain for modifying attack ability usage
Use DamageChain for modifying unarmed damage dice
Follow FightingStyleCondition pattern for MartialArts condition
